results.content: Fantastic course. This course is a must for JavaScript enthusiasts!!!!

results.content: I have completed the course and I can say that the topics and the exercises are very good if you have some previous knowledge about JS. The author explains very well and easy to understand. You will get a lot of information about how JS engine works and by this, it will be much easier to understand the tricky parts of the language.
